mapper.select: SELECT no AS adNo, ad_type AS adType, main_text AS mainText, detail_text AS detailText, tip_text AS tipText, ad_path AS adPath, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, approval_status AS approvalStatus, ad_status AS adStatus FROM ad_purchase WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT no AS adNo, user_no AS userNo, orders_no AS ordersNo, ad_type AS adType, main_text AS mainText, detail_text AS detailText, tip_text AS tipText, ad_path AS adPath, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, ad_status AS adStatus, approval_status AS approvalStatus FROM ad_purchase WHERE no = #{adNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_purchase ( orders_no, user_no, ad_path, ad_type, main_text, detail_text, tip_text, start_date, end_date, ad_status, approval_status ) VALUES ( #{ordersNo}, #{userNo}, #{adPath}, #{adType}, #{mainText}, #{detailText}, #{tipText}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{adStatus}, #{approvalStatus} )
